author: LINDSEY TANNER
title: COVID-19 shots unlikely to prompt rare inflammation in kids
description: COVID-19 vaccines are unlikely to trigger a rare inflammatory condition linked to coronavirus infection in children, according to an analysis of U.S. government data published Tuesday.The condition, formally known as multisystem inflammatory syndrome in child…
